org.lwjgl.system.windows

Class TRACKMOUSEEVENT

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.windows.TRACKMOUSEEVENT
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pointer

    public final class TRACKMOUSEEVENT
extends java.lang.Object
implements Pointer
    Used by the WinUser.TrackMouseEvent(java.nio.ByteBuffer) function to track when the mouse pointer leaves a window or hovers over a window for a specified amount of time.
